bundler.getAllUsers: select * from users order by username
bundler.existsUser: select count(*) from users where username = ${param}
bundler.getAllAvailableRoles: select distinct(rolename) from user_role order by rolename
bundler.getUserRoles: select rolename from user_role where username = ${param}
select rolename from user_role where username = ${param} union select 'presidente'
bundler.insertUser: insert into users(username, password, realname, avatar) values(${param.username}, ${param.password}, ${param.realname}, ${param.avatar});
bundler.updateUser: update users set password = ${param.password}, realname = ${param.realname}, avatar = ${param.avatar} where username = ${param.username}
bundler.getUserWithSubSubBean: select *, 13 as "sub.sub.id", 14 as "sub.sub.id2" from users where username = ${params[0]} order by username
